entry.title: Release sketch v1.1.0
entry.summary: This is a major release. Here is a list of major improvements (from v1.0.3):

entry.title: Sketch: Interactive Visualisations in R with a JavaScript Twist
entry.id: Sketch: Interactive Visualisations in R with a JavaScript Twist
entry.summary: The fourth industrial revolution is digital, and there is now a deluge of data just waiting to be visualised - the question is does the R community have all the necessary tools to create amazing interactive visualisations?

entry.title: Release sketch v1.0.3 (CRAN acceptance)
entry.summary: We are very happy to introduce the R package sketch for creating animated and interactive visualisation in R! Sketch lets users develop JavaScript-style visualisations using the R syntax by transpiling R code into JavaScript code. It is designed to help
